articles.title: Colgate-Palmolive sees massive drop in ad violations with DoubleVerify
articles.author: Alisha Buaya
articles.summary: Colgate-Palmolive Australia has improved its video ad campaign's brand suitability by 93% using DoubleVerify's pre-bid controls. This new approach helps Colgate-Palmolive proactively avoid unsuitable content and optimize future campaign results.

articles.title: 35 Products So Effective, Using Them Will Make You Feel Like You Have Superpowers
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: The content highlights the introduction of several new products: a WD-40 pen for precise application of lubricant, self-heating soothing foot masks for relaxation, a teeth-whitening pen for quick and easy whitening, and the Bissell Little Green machine for cleaning pet accidents.

articles.title: 27 Underrated Things To Try Before They Go Viral
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: Sol de Janeiro has launched Cheirosa 71 shimmering body cream, which is a limited-edition beauty product.  Chasin' Rabbits introduced an eye cream roller that moisturizes and de-puffs under-eye area.  Doap introduced a new type of bar soap, Doap bar to unstuck sticky dough that's stuck to your hands.

articles.title: Man accused of stabbing 11 people at a Walmart is in Michigan authorities' custody
articles.summary: WeAreIowa's streaming service is accessible on phones via the WeAreIowa app.

articles.title: MARS Launches New Skittles Cloudz With Met Service Website And Britomart Takeover
articles.author: Mars
articles.summary: MARS launched Skittles Cloudz, a new soft-format version of Skittles, in New Zealand. The launch involved a visual takeover of Britomart station and a themed integration with the MetService website to promote the product and connect with consumers.

articles.title: 32 Summer Products For Homebodies
articles.author: Amber Usher
articles.summary: The content introduces several new products, including the Ninja Slushi maker for creating frozen drinks, the Yonanas soft-serve maker for healthy ice cream alternatives, Amazon Fire TV Stick 4K for streaming, PopLite personal popcorn maker, and the Dazzle Dry Mini Kit for fast-drying manicures.

articles.title: 39 Amazon Home Products Our Readers Are Loving In 2025
articles.author: Buzz Feed
articles.summary: The content introduces several new products. It includes an air purifier with adjustable fan speeds and a night mode, a bug zapper for outdoor insect control, a mold stain remover for bathroom caulking, and a towel warmer. Also a furniture revitalizing product is mentioned which can breathe a new life to old furniture.

articles.title: Leading with Flavour, Driven by Insight: PURA Unveils Its Refreshed Beverage Line-Up
articles.author: SAT Articles
articles.summary: PURA Beverages unveiled a refreshed look and brand positioning for its Modern Refreshment beverage products, including PURA Soda, PURA Kids, and PURA Hydrate. The unveiling occurred at a brand showcase at Checkers Head Office in Johannesburg and included a new packaging system with cleaner layouts and stronger color blocking. This refresh is designed to increase shelf standout and align with evolving shopper trends.

articles.title: This >$500 robot vacuum is one of the very best budget bots I've tested â€“ the edge cleaning is top-notch and it rarely needs emptying
articles.author: James Holland
articles.summary: 3i launched the G10+, a hybrid robot vacuum and mop, at CES 2025. The G10+ features a large dust cup with compression and an extending side brush and mop pad. It is priced at $449 but was reduced to $399 and is comparable to other models like Narwal Freo X Plus, Roomba 205 DustCompactor Combo, Shark Matrix Plus 2-in-1, and Ecovacs Deebot N10 Plus.

articles.title: Baek Da-yeon Claims ITF Tunisia International Women's Singles Title
articles.author: Luis Mendoza
articles.summary: Tech Giant Name launched Assistant Name, a groundbreaking new AI assistant. The system is designed to offer a seamless and intuitive user experience by analyzing user behavior, preferences, and even emotional cues to provide personalized and effective support. The assistant manages schedules, filters communications, and offers creative suggestions.

articles.title: Budget Android phones aren't actually all bad (and they're getting better)
articles.author: Roger Fingas
articles.summary: The Samsung A16, one of Samsung's budget devices, features a 6.7-inch OLED display, an eight-core processor, a 50-megapixel main camera, and 128GB of internal storage. The 4G model can handle apps like Instagram and Google Maps, and the base A16 can download at up to 400Mbps.

articles.title: Don't Be Fooled By These 5 Tech Buzzwordsâ€”They're Just Marketing Hype
articles.author: Ben Stegner
articles.summary: Various companies like VPNSecure and Mailbird altered or revoked 'lifetime' licenses after acquisitions or new product versions. FastestVPN utilizes deceptive marketing tactics with fake deals, while T-Mobile and Verizon offer 'unlimited' plans with data caps and restrictive terms. Verizon also advertises 'free' phones tied to expensive plans, potentially costing consumers more overall.

articles.title: Don't take your Kindle to the beach without reading this first
articles.author: Kelsey Fogarty
articles.summary: Amazon introduced two new Kindle models: the Kindle Colorsoft 16GB and Kindle Colorsoft Kids. The Kindle Paperwhite, Kindle Colorsoft, and Kindle Oasis are designed to be waterproof with an IPX8 rating, tested by Amazon for use near pools and beaches.

articles.title: Reviewers Are Singing The Praises Of These 34 Genius Kitchen Products
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: The article introduces a range of new kitchen and home products designed to simplify cooking, cleaning, and organization. These include items like a lasagna trio pan for customized meals, a pancake batter mixer for quick breakfasts, and a plant-based cooking oil solidifier for easier grease disposal, aiming to enhance efficiency and convenience in the kitchen.

articles.title: AI Alone Won't Save You: Solve A Real Problem First
articles.author: Darpan Munjal
articles.summary: Atom.com launched semantic search, which is built to bridge the gap between how people describe what they want and how results are delivered. Dharmesh Shah, co-founder of HubSpot, is building Agent.ai, a suite of AI-powered tools designed to assist with tasks such as researching companies and summarizing complex inputs.

articles.title: New world (luxury) order
articles.author: CEDTy Clea
articles.summary: AITO, a sub-brand of Seres Auto with ties to Huawei, recently launched in the Philippines, introducing its premium, high-tech vehicles. The AITO M9, a flagship SUV, boasts advanced features like semi-autonomous driving and self-parking. AITO is positioning itself as a brand that emphasizes technology as the new luxury.

articles.title: Full list of Lidl bargains landing in stores next week including Dyson dupe and handheld steamer
articles.author: Senior Consumer Reporter
articles.summary: Lidl is launching a new range of homeware products in its stores. These include the Silvercrest Cordless Cyclone Vacuum, a Gtech AirRam MK2 Cordless Vacuum, a Silvercrest Garment Steamer, and a Philips Fabric Shaver, as well as a Silentnight Memory Foam Mattress Topper, Livarno Home LED lamps, and a Fairy Soap Dispensing Dish Brush.

articles.title: A Conversation With Verizon Business Chief Product + Marketing Officer Iris Meijer On Synching The Product + Marketing Functions To Innovate The Customer Experiences Of Tomorrow
articles.author: Billee Howard
articles.summary: Verizon Business has launched a new Customer eXperience Index (CXI), an AI-powered tool providing real-time insights into customer satisfaction across various touchpoints. Additionally, they have introduced a Bill Inquiry Tool, an easy-to-use chatbot designed to answer customer billing questions, initially rolled out to service representatives before a wider digital release. These initiatives aim to enhance customer experience, reduce churn, and increase revenue.

articles.title: How retailtainment, real-time messaging are driving sales, ROI for brands
articles.summary: Infobip's platform facilitates real-time customer engagement through AI-powered messaging, enhancing conversion rates and customer satisfaction. Infobip's platform helps businesses create unified, end-to-end journeys that blend entertainment, engagement, and transaction. Brands in Malaysia are using WhatsApp, utilizing tools like Infobip's AI chatbot builder to showcase products and facilitate checkouts.

articles.title: Aldi Shoppers Can't Stop Talking About This $5 Breakfast Must-Have That's â€˜Amazing in the Air Fryer'
articles.author: Lauren Murphy
articles.summary: Aldi's frozen hash browns are gaining popularity as a budget-friendly breakfast item. Shoppers praise their convenience and taste, especially when cooked in an air fryer. The product is considered a versatile and easy breakfast upgrade.

articles.title: Elon Musk\u0026#039;s Optimus gets tough competition, Chinese company unveils athletic humanoid robot, costs Rs...
articles.author: DNA India
articles.summary: A Chinese firm launched a new humanoid robot. The robot can perform a range of actions.

articles.title: I tested the Supernote Nomad and Rocketbook Core. Which digital notebook is best?
articles.author: Henry T. Casey
articles.summary: The Rocketbook Core is introduced as a budget-friendly physical notebook designed for easy scanning and reuse with its app. The Supernote Nomad is launched as a pricier E Ink tablet providing a natural digital handwriting experience that syncs in the cloud, with features like cloud storage, undo gestures, and user-replaceable battery.

articles.title: What does GPT in ChatGPT stand for?
articles.author: TOI Trending Desk
articles.summary: OpenAI created GPT technology and released its first version, GPT-1, in 2018. Subsequent releases included GPT-2 in 2019 and GPT-3 in 2020. ChatGPT was launched in November 2022, followed by newer versions like GPT-4 and GPT-4o with added capabilities.

articles.title: If Your Favorite Words Are 'Food' And 'Sleep,' These 32 Cool Products Will Make You Very Happy
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Nuts 'N More introduced Chocolate Maple Pretzel Peanut Butter Spread. Hatch launched Restore 3, a sunrise alarm and sound machine, while Ghetto Gastro released Sweet Potato Pancake & Waffle Mix. Neuromints offers "Sleep & Recharge" melatonin Neuromints.

articles.title: Samsung's big foldy phone is back with a sleek update
articles.author: Tim Biggs
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy Z Fold7, a significant upgrade to its folding phone line. The new model is thinner and lighter than previous versions, addressing bulkiness issues. It also features a wider cover screen and a larger eight-inch internal OLED screen for improved multitasking.

articles.title: Burger King Unveils New Whopper
articles.summary: Burger King launched the BBQ Brisket Whopper nationwide on July 15th as the first release under its 'Whopper by You' platform, which allows customers to submit ideas for new Whopper creations. The burger features BBQ brisket, crispy onions, American cheese, and BBQ sauce on a flame-grilled beef patty and is available for a limited time.

articles.title: 39 Amazon Pet Products Our Readers Are Loving In 2025
articles.author: Jonathan Mazzei
articles.summary: Meowy Janes, a small business based in New Egypt, New Jersey, specializes in catnip and catnip alternatives and is offering matatabi chew sticks as an all-natural alternative to catnip for cats. The business is selling custom pet illustrations by uploading a photo and selecting preferences, then Haus and Hues team will transform it into a stunning portrait.

articles.title: I swapped my expensive skincare routine for a Â£3 Primark serum and I'll be buying it again
articles.author: Ray Bonsall
articles.summary: Primark introduced its SPF 30 serum drops, priced at Â£5 (on sale for Â£3), as a cost-effective alternative to expensive serums. This product combines sun protection with skincare benefits, containing argan oil, vitamin E, and hyaluronic acid. The serum offers hydration and SPF protection, making it a convenient addition to daily skincare routines.

articles.title: Lidl's DIY Ice Cream Maker: Summer's Hottest Accessory Returns
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: Lidl is re-launching its popular DIY Ice Cream Maker on July 28th, 2025. This budget-friendly appliance, typically priced around â‚¬29.99, allows users to create homemade ice cream, sorbet, and frozen yogurt using a manual churning process and offers control over ingredients and dietary flexibility.

articles.title: New Bath & Body Works Scents Smell Like "Walking Into Starbucks"â€”And Shoppers Are Obsessed â€” Best Life
articles.author: Zachary Mack
articles.summary: Bath & Body Works has introduced two new scents, Vanilla CafÃ© and Rich Espresso, inspired by coffee shop aromas. Vanilla CafÃ© features notes of smooth espresso, whipped vanilla, and toasted hazelnut, while Rich Espresso contains notes of dark roast coffee and hazelnut froth. Both scents are available in various formats including body cream, fragrance mist, and body wash.

articles.title: Huawei launches the Huawei Pura 80 Series
articles.author: Back End News
articles.summary: Huawei launched the Pura 80 Series smartphones, featuring a new camera system with a switchable dual telephoto lens and large sensor, along with AI tools like AI Remove. The company also introduced the Huawei MatePad 11.5-inch (2025) tablet with a PaperMatte Display, magnetic keyboard, and full support for office apps, targeting students and young professionals.

articles.title: This Popular New T-Shirt Dress Is on Sale for $13 at Amazon Right Now
articles.author: Clara Mcmahon
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the newly launched Ofeefan Tie-Waist T-Shirt Dress with a 57% discount, starting at $13. This dress features a versatile silhouette, V-neckline, cap sleeves, an adjustable tie-waist, and pockets, available in five sizes and 12 styles on Amazon.

articles.title: 5 most expensive Itel phones in the market
articles.author: Vanguard
articles.summary: Itel plans to enter the premium smartphone market in 2025. The new smartphones will offer high-end features, stylish designs, and strong performance, marking a shift from Itel's traditional budget-friendly focus.

articles.title: Lava Blaze Dragon 5G Sale Will Begin on August 1, 2025; Check Launch Price, Specifications and Features
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Lava launched its new budget 5G smartphone, the Lava Blaze Dragon 5G, in India on July 25. Priced at INR 9,999, it will be available at a discounted price of INR 8,999 with bank offers, and the sale starts on August 1. The Blaze Dragon 5G features a Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 processor, 4GB RAM, 128GB internal storage, a 6.74-inch display with a 120Hz refresh rate, a 50MP main camera, a 5,000mAh battery with 18W fast charging, and runs on Android 15.

articles.title: HONOR Launches the All-new HONOR X6c & HONOR X7c
articles.summary: HONOR has announced the launch of the HONOR X6c and HONOR X7c smartphones. The HONOR X6c features AI capabilities, enhanced durability, and a long-lasting battery, while the HONOR X7c offers a larger screen and solid performance. The HONOR X6c will be available starting July 26th, 2025, at Rs. 29,999 (18GB ROM) and Rs. 34,999 (256GB ROM), and the HONOR X7c is priced at Rs. 39,999 (256GB ROM).

articles.title: OnePlus Nord 5 Review: A Midrange Phone Focused on Selfies
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: OnePlus introduced the Nord 5, a mid-range smartphone featuring a Qualcomm Snapdragon 8S Gen 3 chipset, a 6.81-inch OLED 144Hz display and a 5,200mAh battery with 80W wired charging. It emphasizes a 50-megapixel selfie camera and introduces the Plus Key, a customizable button, while facing competition from models like the Poco F7 and Google's Pixel 9A.

articles.title: Ellegyn Intimate Wash: your summer essential for intimate comfort and protection
articles.summary: Alta Care Laboratoires has developed Ellegyn Intimate Wash, a gentle wash designed for daily use to support women's intimate health. The product reinforces natural defenses, promotes comfort, maintains healthy pH levels, and combats the negative effects of heat and sweat.

articles.title: The Porsche 911 GTS taught me hybrids can be a riot when they want to be
articles.author: Tom Morgan-Freelander
articles.summary: Porsche has introduced the 911 GTS T-Hybrid, a new model of its iconic sports car featuring a hybrid powertrain. This car boasts a 3.6-liter turbocharged flat-six engine and an electric motor, delivering 534bhp and achieving 0-62mph in 3.1 seconds. The new model has bolder styling and updated technology while retaining the classic 911 feel.

articles.title: I tried viral shave butter, my legs have never been smoother â€“ I'll never go back to foam
articles.author: Lynn Kernan
articles.summary: Mallows Shave Butter, created by Laura Mallows, is now available at Superdrug. This product, containing shea butter and grapeseed oil, aims to provide a close shave and smooth skin, and is priced at Â£14.95 a tub.

articles.title: Maca Scents: How a husband-and-wife duo is redefining affordable luxury in fragrance
articles.author: Ashley Lechman
articles.summary: In 2024, Maca Scents launched its "Intense range, Extrait de Parfum," boasting double the oil concentrate of a typical EDP.  The company also introduced refillable perfume atomisers and plans to launch car diffusers as an extension of their home fragrance range.

articles.title: SPF But Make It Fancy: 7 Sunscreen Mists That Deserve A Place In Your Tote
articles.author: Team Elle
articles.summary: Several brands offer sun mists, including Victoria's Secret. These SPF products hydrate, brighten, and protect the skin with ingredients such as coconut water, niacinamide, rose water, aloe vera, raspberry extract, hyaluronic acid, Vitamin E + C, rosehip, red algae, beetroot extract, white rose, and strawberry. They also offer features such as UVA and UVB ray protection, and anti-aging.

articles.title: I test mind-boggling 4mm thin Samsung phone that folds in HALF â€“ & it has huge perk your posh iPhone is missing
articles.author: Head
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Z Fold 7, a foldable phone featuring a slim design, measuring 4.2mm unfolded and 8.9mm when folded. It boasts a 6.5-inch external OLED display and an 8-inch internal OLED display, powered by a Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, with prices starting at Â£1,799. The device includes a versatile camera system with up to five cameras, including a 200-megapixel wide-angle lens.

articles.title: 27 Lowe's Products To Spruce Up Your Home
articles.author: Griffin Gonzales
articles.summary: GE is offering a French door refrigerator with ample space and attractive design. Serta introduces a hybrid mattress with memory foam and coils, providing comfort and support, along with a 90-day test-rest guarantee. LG features an ultra-large capacity stacked washer and dryer with AI technology, and Moen presents a six-spray dual shower head and a pull-down kitchen faucet with modern design and easy installation.

articles.title: July Alert: New Restaurants And Menus Spicing Up Delhi NCR's Food Scene
articles.author: Swati Chaturvedi
articles.summary: Gola Sizzlers launched a new outlet with a reimagined menu. Little Caesars expanded to Delhi NCR with India-exclusive pizzas. YouMee introduced the 'Manga Matsuri' summer festival menu, and Dough & Cream launched a limited-edition Monsoon Menu.

articles.title: Nippon Paint introduces â€˜n-SHIELD' paint protection films in India
articles.author: ETManufacturing Desk
articles.summary: Nippon Paint has launched its 'n-SHIELD' Paint Protection Films (PPF) in India's automotive surface protection market, offering gloss, matte, and colored PPF variants, ceramic coatings, and detailing solutions. The company is expanding nationwide, integrating with dealers, and establishing n-SHIELD studios via franchise partnerships.

articles.title: Explore these AI-powered apps for styling suggestions and virtual outfit trials
articles.author: Team SMD
articles.summary: AI Outfit Try-On app allows users to virtually try on clothes from top brands by uploading a photo and selecting a style. MyEdit Online's AI Outfit Generator designs endless outfit combinations based on uploaded photos or chosen models, enabling users to tweak colors and styles.

articles.title: Nippon Paint launches n-Shield PPF in India, eyes car surface care leadership
articles.author: Srinjoy Bal
articles.summary: Nippon Paint has launched n-Shield, a new brand offering paint protection film (PPF) and surface care products in India. The n-Shield portfolio includes PPFs in various finishes, headlamp and sunroof protection films, ceramic coatings, and detailing products, supported by warranties and trained applicators, aiming to provide comprehensive vehicle surface protection.

articles.title: HONOR launches all-new HONOR X6c, X7c
articles.summary: HONOR has launched two new smartphones: the HONOR X6c, which is designed for mid-range users with AI features and a stylish design, and the HONOR X7c, which offers a larger screen and powerful battery life. Both phones continue the X Series tradition of combining performance, AI features, and smooth operation.

articles.title: 37 Random, Ridiculously Handy Products
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Several companies have recently introduced new products. EOS launched a limited edition Marshmallow "Super Balm" lip treatment. Dreo released a bladeless, oscillating Tower Fan with multiple speeds and modes. Burt's Bees introduced a sunburn soother made with aloe and coconut oil. Elizavecca launched a hair treatment mask infused with collagen. Lumify released Eye Drops for instant reduction in redness. Revlon has a oil-absorbing volcanic face roller, and L'Oreal Paris launched Infallible 3-Second Setting Spray Mist.

articles.title: From beauty to gaming: How smart tech is quietly transforming accessibility
articles.author: Dana Alomar
articles.summary: Dyson introduced the Airwrap i.d., a hair styling tool designed to simplify curling and drying hair with features like airflow control and app-based settings. L'OrÃ©al launched HAPTA, a lipstick applicator equipped with sensors and gyroscopic technology to assist individuals with limited hand or arm mobility. Microsoft developed the Xbox Adaptive Controller, featuring oversized buttons and input ports to personalize the gaming experience for players with limited mobility.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy A56 5G Price Cut Signals Competitive Market Shift
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung dramatically reduced the price of the Galaxy A56 5G, with the 8GB RAM/256GB storage variant now priced at Tk 49,999 and the 12GB RAM/256GB storage model also on offer, priced at Tk 4,999. This price adjustment aims to broaden its appeal to budget-conscious consumers against competitors like Xiaomi, Realme, and OnePlus.

articles.title: AI's Vogue Experiment: Redefining Beauty Standards
articles.author: Marina Collins
articles.summary: Vogue magazine has featured AI-generated models like Seraphinne Vallora, Lil Miquela, and Shudu Gram, sparking debate about the future of beauty and representation. These AI influencers are collaborating with brands like Prada and Calvin Klein, demonstrating their commercial viability and impact on fashion trends. The use of AI models raises ethical concerns regarding transparency and the potential displacement of human models.

articles.title: 32 Reviewer-Beloved Gems Hidden In The Depths Of Amazon
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Nyx launched the "Smushy" Matte Lip Balm, featuring mochi rice powder. Moroccanoil introduced the Mini Must-Haves Sampler, which is an affordable way to try the brand's products. Dove released Coconut Milk & Sugar Lychee Body Wash, a gentle, moisturizing body wash suitable for sensitive skin.

articles.title: Plug.ng redefines digital payments
articles.author: Alao Abiodun
articles.summary: Plug.ng has launched a new digital platform in Nigeria to simplify routine transactions such as airtime, data, electricity, and streaming subscriptions. The platform offers features such as virtual dollar cards, low mobile data prices (â‚¦200 per GB), a verified wallet system with personal account numbers, and a signup bonus of â‚¦1,000 for new users.

articles.title: Quick fashion plays trials with AI to win â€˜no return' game
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: Startups are heavily investing in 'try and buy' and virtual try-on tools. These tools aim to reduce returns and enhance the customer experience, representing a new service offering within the retail and e-commerce sectors.

articles.title: SugarBun turns 46 with new outlet
articles.author: Juiceapac Web Development Team
articles.summary: SugarBun has launched a new SugarBun Express outlet at Lintas Jaya, featuring a streamlined concept and catering to on-the-go consumers. They have also introduced Kolo Mee to their menu and launched Sabacco, a line of bottled hot sauces, featuring chilis sourced from local farmers. Following the Lintas Jaya opening, SugarBun Express has also launched at V21 Residence at KKIP on July 18.

articles.title: 17 Products With Weirdly Gross (And Effective) Powers
articles.author: Curtis Teegardin
articles.summary: The article showcases a range of new products designed to enhance personal care and hygiene. These include the Medicube Turmeric Overnight Wrapping Peel Off Mask, which brightens and smooths skin, and the Truremedy Naturals Remedy Tea Tree Oil body wash, formulated to cleanse, moisturize, and deodorize. Additionally, Tend Skin Solution is featured as a solution for ingrown hairs and razor burn, aiming to promote smooth skin.

articles.title: What Guess
articles.author: BBC News
articles.summary: Guess features the first AI-generated model in a Vogue advertisement.

articles.title: Does this look like a real woman? AI Vogue model raises concerns about beauty standards
articles.author: BBC News
articles.summary: Guess is utilizing the first AI-generated model in a Vogue advertisement. This marks an innovative approach to advertising and leverages new AI technology in marketing.

articles.title: Senthera, a new body care brand, launches in India their Make Love collection
articles.author: The Hindu
articles.summary: Margarita Kuritsyna founded Senthera, a new body care brand inspired by childhood fragrances.

articles.title: MG Comet Becomes Expensive With Price Hike On Battery Rent, Check Details
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: The company has revised charges for battery rent under its Battery-as-a-Service (BaaS) program. Customers now have to pay an additional Rs 15,000.

articles.title: Trader Joe's is Opening New Location in New Jersey and We Have the Awesome Details
articles.author: Shawn Michaels
articles.summary: Trader Joe's will introduce their services with a new location in Woodbridge, Middlesex County, New Jersey, situated at 675 Route 1.
